testsuite.name: com.adityachandel.booklore.service.hardcover.HardcoverSyncServiceTest

testcase.name: Should skip sync when progress is null
Should set status to CURRENTLY_READING when progress < 99%
Should skip sync when API key is blank
Should skip sync when user settings not found
Should use ISBN10 when ISBN13 is missing
Should skip further processing when book not found on Hardcover
Should skip sync when book has no metadata
Should skip sync when book not found
Should skip sync when API key is missing
Should set status to READ when progress >= 99%
Should skip sync when no ISBN available
Should use stored hardcoverBookId when available
Should search by ISBN when hardcoverBookId is not stored
Should skip sync when Hardcover sync is not enabled for user
